name: Justice and Inquiry
description:
A detective-style game of inquiry and judgment.

The truth must be uncovered but also must be proven. Inquirers, with the Mediums by their sides, will utilize both reason and divination to uncover suspects' hidden testimonies and suppressed emotions.

Currently the battle system isn't especially well-balanced.

--Controls--

Z/Enter = Confirm

X = Back/Menu

F4 = Fullscreen

F5 = Display Customization

Let me know if there are any inconsistencies or typos.

An entry for 30 Day RPG Maker Themed Jam #4

Made in RPG Maker 2003
